description:
Welcome world famous Justine Joli in her first hogtied shoot. Justine normally only does girl/girl scenes, however for us she let loose. Matt Williams and the Sgt have their way with our sexy newcomer in the next-door basement. Justine always wanted to be bound, dominated, and made to cum by two men, so who are we to disappoint.

This update was shot in widescreen HD. We are testing this format.
iPod-REAL-WMV
16:9 aspect ratio @ 900Kbps
title: Justine Joli and Sgt. Major
